law.history: Repealed 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 125, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 313, sec. 2, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 52, sec. 4. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1599a-7.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Certificate of apprenticeship -- Number of apprentices allowed per funeral director or embalmer.
